title: Africa Digital Inclusion Diaspora Network
description: Driven by Africa Digital Inclusion Alliance as a major organ, this network connects Africans outside the continent to contribute positively to digital development in Africa. It operates across five continents with quarterly activities and an annual diaspora forum.

title: Chamber of Skill Development
description: Focuses on lifelong digital learning, skilling, upskilling, and reskilling for all sectors and institutions, enhancing digital literacy continent-wide.

title: Chamber of Device Access & Development
description: Promotes affordable, accessible digital devices for learning and work, fostering digital ownership.
